The first entry is the hardest. A world begins with a name.
Curiosity outweighs caution  you seek to understand the unknown
Tales of ten, each beast now bound in memory and ink
You walk among monsters, not as prey  but as their historian
Their forms change. Your pursuit does not
Forty pages stained with truth, blood, and insight
Half a hundred horrors humbled with a glance
Congratulations, you're now a Turbo Bloob!

Every crop has a beginning, and so does knowledge.
Patterns emerge in soil and seed.
Ten harvests, ten stories inked into time.
You read the land like others read a book.
Roots, soil, and sky  all connected through your homestead.
Forty crops chronicled, each a whisper of the seasons.
The homestead knows your name now.
Teleport to the Homestead
WOAH You little thief!!
WOAH You little thief!!
Every journey begins with a single cast.
The waters are starting to feel familiar.
10 Fishers Logs
The forest answers your first strike.
Your axe finds its rhythm.
Each cut is cleaner than the last.
Stone yields to your first blow.
The earth begins to crack open.
Each swing rings true.
You know where the riches lie.
Few dare mine where you tread.
A single footprint is enough to begin.
Broken branches and bent grass tell a story.
You follow without being seen.
The land offers its first gift.
You start to notice what others pass by.
You harvest without harm.
Soil, shade, and season guide your search.
You know whats ripe before you see it.
